function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguity in optimization problem formulation and implementation details","Impact":"Misinterpretation can lead to incorrect results and suboptimal solutions","Mitigation":"Provide clear and specific instructions for formulating the optimization problem and implementing the software prototype","Technologies":"Optimization software, visualization tools","People":"Developers, mathematicians, architects, designers","Owner":"Development team, domain experts"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of physical distancing requirements in room layout","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Incorporate physical distancing guidelines and tools into the room layout optimization process","Technologies":"Spatial analysis software, social distancing simulation tools","People":"Architects, interior designers, public health experts","Owner":"Design and planning teams"},{"Description":"Lack of clarity in the visualization of the obtained solution","Impact":"Difficulty in interpreting and analyzing the optimized room layout","Mitigation":"Ensure clear and intuitive visualization techniques for the 3D scene of the obtained solution","Technologies":"3D modeling and rendering software, interactive visualization tools","People":"Architects, designers, stakeholders","Owner":"Visualization and design teams"}]}
